definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Come and enjoy the most honorable hospitality, courtesy and entertainment in Gentle Hot Spring Golf Club.
sentences.chinese: 南中国最尊荣的款待，尽在嘉和城温泉高尔夫球会。

sentences.english: When your fastball moves by a foot, that's pretty sexy.
sentences.chinese: 当你的快速球会坠移一呎，真是有够诱惑。

sentences.english: If thrown right, a curveball drops right before it gets to home plate.
sentences.chinese: 假如投得正确，曲球会正巧在抵达本垒前坠下。

sentences.english: Beautiful handcrafted musical pendant for mom-to-be to wear as necklace, with the pendant resting low on her belly.
sentences.chinese: 准妈妈佩戴附送的项链，音乐球会自然下垂至腹部。

sentences.english: Kkk : What do you think about great successes of the Spanish clubs in Euro league ?
sentences.chinese: 你对西班牙球会在欧洲的成功有什么看法？

sentences.english: Guangzhou Luhu Golf Club is a private club.
sentences.chinese: 广州麓湖高尔夫球会为一家私人会所。

sentences.english: You see them kissing the badge all the time.
sentences.chinese: 你可以时常看到他们亲吻自己球会的徽章。

sentences.english: When you drink, the ball is blocked by the gravity in the recess of the glass.
sentences.chinese: 当你饮用时，球会被凹陷的玻璃吸住，阻止其滚出。

sentences.english: Are you the member of our club?
sentences.chinese: 您是我们球会的会员吗？

sentences.english: Now that P rez has been elected, does he have to fund the club?
sentences.chinese: 现在佩雷斯已经当选，他需要为球会提供资金吗？

sentences.english: Throw a tennis ball on the floor. The ball bounces back.
sentences.chinese: 将网球扔到地板上，球会弹回来。

sentences.english: The ball will transmit infra- red (IR) light.
Do you feel this club can now go on and challenge for more honours this season?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得球会现在可以挑战本赛家更多的荣耀吗？

definition: club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system
